```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(here)
```

load data
```{r}
# read in list of csvs
files <- list.files(path = "TLS_plot_CSVs", pattern = "*.csv", full.names = TRUE)
df_list <- lapply(files, read.csv)

# combine list of dataframes into one dataframe
tls_wv <- do.call(rbind, df_list)
```

create new column for plot number 
```{r}
# select everything in the string before the . 
tls_wv$plot_id <- sub("\\..*", "", tls_wv$ID)

# select everything in the string after the . 
tls_wv$tree_id <- sub(".*\\.", "", tls_wv$ID)

# export merged .csv
write.csv(tls_wv, "TLS_wood_vol.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
